Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:settext('[arrow keys] to move, [enter] to set a binding, [delete] to remove a binding and [escape] to leave\ngameplay uses \'Left\', \'Right\', \'Up\' and \'Down\' bindings but not the Action related keys\nif you don\'t have a numpad, you should bind buttons for P2 (the right side) to navigate menus') end
